claim_summary: Arkansas Code § 25‑10‑129 authorizes the Department of Human Services to promulgate rules necessary to conform to federal statutes, rules and regulations affecting programs it administers.  The General Assembly intends that DHS utilize federal funding to the fullest extent and recognizes that federal requirements change frequently.  The statute empowers the department to adopt federal provisions by rule so that the state’s welfare, medical assistance and other programs remain eligible for federal funding【796504054028413†L72-L103】.
